script:
1). Shouldn't we check in with the receptionist?
I didn't bring my checkbook.
Yes, we should check it out.
Yes, I suppose we should. 
2). What time does Mr. Rubble's flight arrive?
It's coming from Holland.
At 8:15 in the morning. 
It will be at Gate C-38.
3). Are you aware of our no-smoking policy?
I don't smoke.
Sorry, I'm not. 
Yes, he wasn't.
